actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to repeal the requirements of the Public Health Service Act which require the reservation of class positions for United States citizens who have completed 2 years of medical training outside the United States.

summary.text: Repeals the requirements of the Public Health Service Act which require the reservation of class positions for United States citizens who have completed two years of medical training outside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the requirements of the Public Health Service Act which require the reservation of class positions for United States citizens who have completed 2 years of medical training outside the United States.
